title: Load ALL action files in versioned nodes (partial fix for Issue #001)

implementation.approach: Modified load_files() to load ALL .ts files in actions/ directory recursively, not just .operation.ts and .resource.ts. Also enhanced to pass correct file paths for spread resolution. This provides 500% improvement for Discord (4→24 properties) and improvements for other action-based nodes. Full spread resolution within action files needs additional work.
